author: Stuart W
comment: App seems pretty cool, but until there is full functionality I can't give it a great rating. I was able to take a picture, give the scene a name but after inputting my "new artist name" I wasn't able to continue. Please fix this, as this seems like just the app I was looking for!
title: 3 Stars for potential

author: Eric Spink
comment: I downloaded this app and was presented with a login screen. When you try to login with Google+ it just gives you an unknown sign in error.
title: Can't sign in or create account

author: Landon Mitchell
comment: Won't connect to my bridge even after resting it, my phone, and my router.
title: Failure to authorize bridge access.

author: Haden Cruickshank
comment: Nice effects and lots for free but useless because I can't connect my Philips Hue Bridge!! :(

author: Patrick Schmalstig
comment: I used to like this app until it started requiring me to purchase a $5/month subscription fee to add my own goshes. Now it's pure garbage. Won't recommend unless the app is a flat price of $10 or less. I'd prefer that we could have up to 5 or so of our own goshes stored in the app for free (stored in the app meaning don't base on number created, base on number of custom goshes I have stored in app). It allowed me to create goshes until now. Now, even when I delete others, it still won't let me. Ripoff. Update 6 months later: Still a rip-off.
title: Good app, bad price

author: Jayden Hajduk
comment: I wouldn't mind paying for the app, but the MONTHLY subscription fee is awful. I have tons of storage for pictures locally as well as with Google Drive, I don't need to pay a monthly fee for picture storage. If this app was $5.00 flat, it would be worth it.
title: Great app, but horrible subscription fee

author: vasil comino
comment: Good little app, but I was wondering why after only 5 hours my battery was at 57%.you got it. This app had taken 11% in the battery usage, the highest. And for most of that period I was at work, no where near home... I uninstalled for this reason, but honestly if it wasn't for that, it is a great hue app
title: Good app, but that battery
